name: Prismo's Time Room ~ Dream Diary
description:
hang out with Prismo & talk about dreams and stuff ~

this is essentially more of a dream diary than a game. write in the dream diary and have your dreams saved

example things to say to Prismo:

  • tell him you had a weird dream
  • ask him to show you all your past dreams
  • ask him to let you download your past dreams (in a neat .txt file)
  • ask him to stop the music or play it again

the source code is openly available here. feel free to fork this project and modify it however you want

Notice:

This is a fan game made by a fan for other fans without intention of profit. The Adventure Time characters, name and logo are all trademarks of Cartoon Network.
